titleStmt.title: Bloody news from Shrewsbury being a true and perfect relation of a horrible villain, by name Thomas Renolds ... he before he was eighteen years of age, murdered Alice Stephens, and her daughter ... for all which, and many other smaller facts ... he was condemned and hanged in chains at Shrewsbury the 14th day of March, 1672/3.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Burton and P. Brooksby,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
